mapper.select: SELECT mf.*, mi.path, m.menu_id AS cmenu_id, m.menu_name AS cmenu_name, m2.menu_id AS pmenu_id, m2.menu_name AS pmenu_name FROM multifile mf, multiitem mi, menu_source ms, menu m JOIN menu m2 ON m.parent_menu_id = m2.menu_id WHERE mf.multifile_id = mi.multifile_id AND mi.scene = '1' AND ms.source_id = mf.multifile_id AND ms.menu_id = m.menu_id AND ms.source_type = 'multifile' AND mf.multifile_id = #{multifileId}

SELECT m.multifile_id,m.title,m.multi_desc,mi.path FROM multifile m INNER JOIN multiitem mi ON m.multifile_id=mi.multifile_id AND mi.scene=1 AND m.multi_type = "pic"
INNER JOIN menu_source ms ON m.multifile_id = ms.source_id WHERE ms.source_type = "multifile" and ms.menu_id = #{menuId}
INNER JOIN menu_source ms ON m.multifile_id = ms.source_id WHERE ms.source_type = "multifile" and find_in_set(ms.menu_id,findChildList(#{menuPId}))
ORDER BY mi.updated_at desc
SELECT m.multifile_id,mi.path,m.title FROM multifile m INNER JOIN multiitem mi ON mi.scene=1 AND mi.multifile_id=m.multifile_id AND mi.multifile_id=#{multifileId}
SELECT title FROM multifile WHERE multifile_id=#{multifileid}
SELECT mf.multifile_id, mf.title, mi.path,mf.multi_desc FROM multifile mf LEFT JOIN multiitem mi ON mf.multifile_id = mi.multifile_id AND mi.scene = '1' WHERE mf.scene = '1' limit 1
